ReducerDefinition.Name: CodeIssue
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing a CodeIssue count.

Parameter.Name: tool
Parameter.Description: The name of the tool whose CodeIssues are to be counted, or '*' for all tools.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Description: The type of CodeIssue to count, or '*' for all types.

ReducerDefinition.Name: FileMetric
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing a FileMetric.

Parameter.Name: sizemetric
Parameter.Description: The size metric to find and return.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Coverage
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing coverage level.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Description: One of 'Percentage', 'NumCovered', or 'NumUncovered'.

Parameter.Name: granularity
Parameter.Description: The type of coverage, such as 'line', 'method', 'class', etc.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Build
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing build invocations, successes, and failures.

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Description: Either the member email or '*' to indicate all members.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Description: 'Success', 'Failure', or '*' to indicate all.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Description: A string specifying the value of the Type property, or '*' to indicate all.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: MemberBuild
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a set of telemetry streams representing build invocations, successes, and failures for each user in the project.

Parameter.Name: result
Parameter.Description: 'Success', 'Failure', or '*' to indicate all.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Description: A string specifying the value of the Type property, or '*' to indicate all.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Commit
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing commit counts.

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Description: The email of the member whose commit counts should be returned, or * for all members.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: MemberCommit
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a set of telemetry streams representing commit counts for each project member.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Coupling
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing coupling data.

Parameter.Name: coupling
Parameter.Description: One of 'Afferent', 'Efferent', or 'All'.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Description: One of 'Total', 'Average', or 'TotalAboveThreshold'.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Description: A string indicating the type of coupling.

Parameter.Name: threshold
Parameter.Description: The threshold value, if the mode is TotalAboveThreshold.

Parameter.Name: tool
Parameter.Description: The tool whose sensor data will be used to generate the coupling data.

ReducerDefinition.Name: CyclomaticComplexity
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing cyclomatic complexity data.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Description: One of 'TotalMethods', 'TotalLines', 'TotalComplexity', 'AverageComplexityPerMethod', or 'TotalMethodsAboveComplexityThreshold'

Parameter.Name: threshold
Parameter.Description: The threshold value, if the mode is TotalMethodsAboveComplexityThreshold.

Parameter.Name: tool
Parameter.Description: The tool whose sensor data will be used to generate the complexity data.

ReducerDefinition.Name: Churn
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing churn counts.

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Description: The email of the member whose churn counts should be returned, or * for all members.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: MemberChurn
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a set of telemetry stream representing churn counts for each project member.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: UnitTest
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing unit test invocations, successes, and failures.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Description: Either 'TotalCount', 'SuccessCount' or 'FailureCount'

Parameter.Name: member
Parameter.Description: The email of the member whose unit test counts should be returned, or * for all members.

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: MemberUnitTest
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a set of telemetry streams representing unit test invocations, successes, and failures for each member of the project.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Description: Either 'TotalCount', 'SuccessCount' or 'FailureCount'

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: DevTime
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a single telemetry stream representing the DevTime of the project in hours.

Parameter.Name: eventType
Parameter.Description: If '*' is supplied, then the dev time will be summed up over all dev event types. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: memberEmail
Parameter.Description: If '*' is supplied, then the dev time will be summed up over all project members.

Parameter.Name: uriPattern
Parameter.Description: Ant-like file pattern specifying the files to be included in computation. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: MemberDevTime
ReducerDefinition.Description: Computes a set of telemetry streams representing the DevTime for each member of the project in hours.

Parameter.Name: eventType
Parameter.Description: If '*' is supplied, then the dev time will be summed up over all dev event types. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: uriPattern
Parameter.Description: Ant-like file pattern specifying the files to be included in computation. (ignored)

Parameter.Name: isCumulative
Parameter.Description: If true, a cumulative version of telemetry stream is returned.

ReducerDefinition.Name: StraightLine
ReducerDefinition.Description: Draws a straight line on the plot. The line can have a slope that can be adjusted by using the delta parameter.

Parameter.Name: initialValue
Parameter.Description: The initial Y value for the line.

Parameter.Name: delta
Parameter.Description: The increment for each interval.
